column4: i think a lot of person install debian just to say " i use debian " not really to use it . so the question is what are they doing on debian. do they run programs ? :))
I run ubuntu because I prefer my machine to be stable :) ...and I have no real need for windows because I don't play most of the games
: there is a lot of games on linux platform too
I like the little mindless games that linux has :)
